description: This file defines a React functional component called FormField, which renders a labeled form input with optional help and error messages. It serves as a reusable form field component for a web application's front-end.

methods.name: FormField({ id, label, help, error, children, required })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a labeled form field with optional help and error messages. Accepts props: id, label, help, error, children, required.
